Title: Gents Accurist gold tone dial black strap watch MS671G
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Gents Accurist gold tone dial black strap watch MS671G RRP £60.00 Now £29.00 Description Classic gents Accurist watch with an all gold tone round dial contrasting against a jet black genuine leather strap. The Accurist brand boast true British design, and this timeless watch displays this styling perfectly. The dial measures 42mm wide including the crown, and the pale gold tone face is surrounded by a polished bezel and hour markings. The minute markers are in black making it clear and easy to read. The glass to the watch face is perfectly flat and the casing measure 7mm deep. The leather strap measures 20mm wide and has a large crocodile texture. With several holes punched in the strap, the watch can be worn for wrist sizes 7” – 8 ¾ " . At 30M water resistant, the watch can be worn everyday safe in the knowledge it is protected from accidental splashes. Complete with a 2 year Accurist warranty and presented in the official branded packaging, this watch is great value.
